Dude Solutions | Raleigh, NC | Devops engineer | ONSITE, contract

Dude Solutions (SchoolDude) is hiring a six-month contract for a devops engineer. We're a fast-moving team using modern tools looking for someone to focus on supporting our internal Kafka/Hadoop team, plus support other automation and infrastructure projects.

We're trying to do devops "right", as a culture, not just tools. Experimentation, fail-fast, and delivering business value. The team lead is committed to individual growth, and we have management buy-in for our projects.

If you're interested, send your resume to brian.cottingham@dudesolutions.com
